item.title: HUB3: Serbisk Ćevapčići | Balkans svar på köfte kebab | Serveret i fladbrød med spicy ajvar, kraftig urte-tomat salat med oliven, marineret spidskål, samt yoghurt dressing med mynte og agurk | Halloumi kebab | Serveret i fladbrød med spicy ajvar, kraftig urte-tomat salat, marineret spidskål og yoghurt dressing med mynte og agurk | Monday | African Peanut Butter Curry | Made with coconut milk, warming spices, potatoes, and chicken thighs. | Served with whole grain rice, yogurt, and oregano. | Made with coconut milk, warming spices, potatoes, and beans. | Tuesday | Spicy Chorizo and “Forest Mushrooms” in Cream Sauce | Whole grain spaghetti with fried mushrooms and chorizo in a creamy, lightly spiced sauce. | Served with parmesan and basil. | Broad Beans and “Forest Mushrooms” in Cream Sauce | Whole grain spaghetti with fried mushrooms and broad beans in a creamy and lightly spicy sauce. | Wednesday | Moroccan Berber Tagine with Eggplant and Chickpeas | Couscous salad with pineapple and fresh herbs. | Served with a mildly spicy and aromatic harissa and a refreshing mint dressing. | Cake of the Day: “Traditional Southern Jutland Cake Table” | Thursday | Spareribs | Juicy ribs marinated in BBQ sauce, served with baked potato, garlic butter, and a fresh cabbage slaw. | Vegetable Patties | Juicy and protein-rich patties made from flavorful vegetables and legumes. | Served with baked potato, garlic butter, and a fresh cabbage slaw. | Friday | Serbian Ćevapčići | The Balkan version of köfte kebab. | Served in flatbread with spicy ajvar, a hearty herb-tomato salad with olives, marinated cabbage, and a yogurt dressing with mint and cucumber. | Halloumi Kebab | Served in flatbread with spicy ajvar, a hearty herb-tomato salad, marinated cabbage, and a yogurt dressing with mint and cucumber. | Vegetar | Vegetarian
item.description: HUB3: Serbisk Ćevapčići | Balkans svar på köfte kebab | Serveret i fladbrød med spicy ajvar, kraftig urte-tomat salat med oliven, marineret spidskål, samt yoghurt dressing med mynte og agurk | Halloumi kebab | Serveret i fladbrød med spicy ajvar, kraftig urte-tomat salat, marineret spidskål og yoghurt dressing med mynte og agurk | Monday | African Peanut Butter Curry | Made with coconut milk, warming spices, potatoes, and chicken thighs. | Served with whole grain rice, yogurt, and oregano. | Made with coconut milk, warming spices, potatoes, and beans. | Tuesday | Spicy Chorizo and “Forest Mushrooms” in Cream Sauce | Whole grain spaghetti with fried mushrooms and chorizo in a creamy, lightly spiced sauce. | Served with parmesan and basil. | Broad Beans and “Forest Mushrooms” in Cream Sauce | Whole grain spaghetti with fried mushrooms and broad beans in a creamy and lightly spicy sauce. | Wednesday | Moroccan Berber Tagine with Eggplant and Chickpeas | Couscous salad with pineapple and fresh herbs. | Served with a mildly spicy and aromatic harissa and a refreshing mint dressing. | Cake of the Day: “Traditional Southern Jutland Cake Table” | Thursday | Spareribs | Juicy ribs marinated in BBQ sauce, served with baked potato, garlic butter, and a fresh cabbage slaw. | Vegetable Patties | Juicy and protein-rich patties made from flavorful vegetables and legumes. | Served with baked potato, garlic butter, and a fresh cabbage slaw. | Friday | Serbian Ćevapčići | The Balkan version of köfte kebab. | Served in flatbread with spicy ajvar, a hearty herb-tomato salad with olives, marinated cabbage, and a yogurt dressing with mint and cucumber. | Halloumi Kebab | Served in flatbread with spicy ajvar, a hearty herb-tomato salad, marinated cabbage, and a yogurt dressing with mint and cucumber. | Vegetar | Vegetarian
